```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test IsPositiveDefinite.")
```



```{r testthat}
test_that("TRUE.", {
  expect_true(
    IsPositiveDefinite(diag(2))
  )
})
test_that("FALSE.", {
  expect_false(
    IsPositiveDefinite(
      matrix(
        data = c(1, 2, 3, 2, 4, 5, 3, 5, 6),
        ncol = 3
      )
    )
  )
  # to cover OTHERWISE
  expect_false(
    IsPositiveDefinite(matrix(1:10, ncol = 2))
  )
})
```
